mapper.insert: insert into chatRoom (roomId, name, mno, maxMembers) values (#{roomId}, #{name}, #{mno}, #{maxMembers})
insert into chatList (mno, roomId, role) values (#{mno}, #{roomId}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT cr.*, COUNT(cl.clNo) - 1 AS currentMembers, cm.message AS lastMessage, cm.sendTime AS lastMessageTime, cm.mno FROM chatRoom AS cr LEFT JOIN chatList AS cl ON cr.roomId = cl.roomId LEFT JOIN chatMessages AS cm ON cr.roomId = cm.roomId JOIN ( SELECT roomId, MAX(sendTime) AS maxSendTime FROM chatMessages GROUP BY roomId ) AS maxTimes ON cm.roomId = maxTimes.roomId AND cm.sendTime = maxTimes.maxSendTime WHERE cr.roomId IN (SELECT roomId FROM chatList WHERE mno = #{mno}) GROUP BY cr.roomId ORDER BY lastMessageTime DESC;
SELECT cr.*, m.startDate FROM chatRoom AS cr LEFT JOIN main AS m ON cr.roomId = m.roomId WHERE cr.roomId = #{roomId};
SELECT cl.*, m.nickname FROM chatList AS cl LEFT JOIN member AS m ON cl.mno = m.mno WHERE cl.roomId = "be9b7a5a-04db-47a5-98bf-6e5e7003b886";
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chatList WHERE roomId = #{roomId} AND mno = #{mno}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM chatList WHERE roomId = #{roomId} and mno = #{mno}
mapper.update: UPDATE chatRoom SET mno = 0 WHERE roomId = #{roomId}
